SELECT DISTINCT t1.ID_ AS taskId, t1.NAME_ AS taskName, t2.NAME_ AS formName, t2.TENANT_ID_ AS tenantId, t2.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS businessKey, t2.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId, t1.CREATE_TIME_ AS startTime, u.`FIRST_` AS username, t1.`SUSPENSION_STATE_` AS status, t1.PRIORITY_ as priority FROM act_ru_task t1 INNER JOIN act_ru_execution t2 ON t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t2.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_ru_identitylink t3 ON t3.TASK_ID_ = t1.ID_ LEFT JOIN `act_hi_procinst` t4 ON t1.`PROC_INST_ID_` = t4.`PROC_INST_ID_` LEFT JOIN `act_id_user` u ON u.`ID_` = t4.`START_USER_ID_` WHERE t2.BUSINESS_KEY_ IS NOT NULL AND ( t1.ASSIGNEE_ = #{userId} OR ( t1.ASSIGNEE_ IN ( SELECT G.group_id_ FROM act_id_membership G WHERE G.user_id_ = #{userId} ) ) OR ( ( t1.ASSIGNEE_ IS NULL OR t1.ASSIGNEE_ = '' ) AND ( t3.USER_ID_ = #{userId} OR t3.GROUP_ID_ IN ( SELECT g.group_id_ FROM act_id_membership g WHERE g.user_id_ = #{userId} ) ) ) )
and ${sql_filter}
